job.title: Software Engineer I (Contract)
job.description:
Local candidates only- This position is on-site @ Apple in Cupertino, CA
Must haves:
-Software Developer
-Excellent Fundamentals in one or more of C, C++ or Objective C
-Wireless automation experience - working with testers (communication and wireless)
-DevOps Tools -Jenkins
Key Qualifications:
-Excellent Fundamentals in one or more of C, C++ or Objective C or a similar language.
-Basic knowledge of RF/Wireless lab equipment.
-Experience in developing test solutions/systems.
Familiarity with data processing and statistical tools.
-Experience or strong academic background with current wireless/RF standards.
Educational Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree required
Master's Preferred
